scripts.book-client-dev-run: cd book/client && npm run dev && cd ../..
scripts.book-client-test-build: cd book/client && npm run test && cd ../..
scripts.book-client-prod-build: cd book/client && npm run prod && cd ../..
scripts.book-worker-dev-run: cd book/service-worker && npm run dev && cd ../..
scripts.book-worker-test-build: cd book/service-worker && npm run test && cd ../..
scripts.book-worker-prod-build: cd book/service-worker && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.book-client-build-test: npm run book-worker-test-build && npm run book-client-test-build
scripts.book-client-build-prod: npm run book-worker-prod-build && npm run book-client-prod-build
scripts.book-build-test: npm run book-client-build-test && npm run book-server-test-build
scripts.book-build-prod: npm run book-client-build-prod && npm run book-server-prod-build
scripts.book-deploy-test: npm run book-client-test-deploy && npm run book-server-test-deploy && npm run book-client-test-invalidate
scripts.book-deploy-prod: npm run book-client-prod-deploy && npm run book-server-prod-deploy && npm run book-client-prod-invalidate
scripts.book-test: npm run book-build-test && npm run book-deploy-test
scripts.book-prod: npm run book-build-prod && npm run book-deploy-prod
scripts.book-dev: concurrently 'npm run book-client-dev-run' 'npm run book-client-dev-codegen' 'npm run book-server-dev-watch' 'npm run book-server-dev-run' 'npm run book-server-dev-stripe'
